name: Az Power
text: Excellent training facility for instrumentation and controls. Our team spent entire week on the custom design training program and showed excellent results during troubleshooting simulation.

name: J Mills
text: Fast service from experienced technicians. Problems with our AC were quickly diagnosed and remedied. Just what we needed.

name: Virgil Woodward
text: Aaron was prompt, courteous, and professional regarding my repair 03/26/2020.  I had my current unit installed by them in 2012, and would highly recommend them to anyone needing their type of service.

name: Ford Firm
text: Every time I need heating and cooling services, I call A Better Service Company. Just replaced the 30+ year old AC unit at my house.

resp.text: Thank you for being such a valued customer over the years!  We look forward to many more!!

name: Bo Warren
text:
Called and left message 7/22/19 late for upstairs AC. Technician arrived next morning  by 10:00 and had the repair made within an hour.
Excellent, reliable service that you can depend on when needed. I'm a longtime customer.  Bo W. in Riverchase.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  We are grateful to have such great customers.

name: Mary James
text: A Better Service Company came HIGHLY recommended by several trusted friends and they did not disappoint.  The pricing is reasonable for exceptional equipment. The team came to install our new unit and were professional, quiet and stayed on task until it was done.  Seems as if they were in and out without making a sound.  Great job - I would recommend them without hesitation!

resp.text: We are very appreciative of such a glowing review! Thank you so much.  Our goal is to provide quality service not only with the equipment installations but maintenance in the years to come.  We look forward to working with you and servicing and maintaining the equipment in the future.

name: Julia D
text: They fixed AC with no problems.  I had to dock a star because they promised to come Monday but didn't show until Tuesday.

name: Cindy Zhu
text: Best contractor ever, very professional and reliable. Price is reasonable too.

resp.text:
We are always grateful for any evaluations we receive from our customer base.  Thank you so much for this positive feedback.  We look forward to serving you again in the future!
Best Regards,
Linda J. Crowder

name: Trish Bufkin
text: I was the site manager for Bent Creek Apartments and I called them I believe the Thursday or Friday before Memorial Day. I requested a quote, needed by my home office, it was approved and they scheduled it for the Wednesday after Memorial Day. Awesome service and prices.

resp.text: We are always thankful for positive feedback and we strive to keep our customers happy.  Thank you for this positive feedback.  We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Eric Eisenberg
text: Terrible service rude owner! Doesn’t return phone calls!!

name: John Cespedes
text: Blue Springs provides terrific service, always keeping their customers' needs first.  I have, and will continue to recommend them to my friends.  I have had them repair as well as install a new system and each time they have come through.

resp.text:
Thank you Mr. Cespedes for sharing your experience with Blue Springs Heating and Cooling.
We appreciate your referal.

name: Tyler Dooley
text: Extremely proffesional, very competitively priced, and very courteous! Honest as they come, not a company who will tell you that you need something that you don't!  I'd recommend them to anyone! Do yourself a favor, save a step and call blue springs.

resp.text:
Thank you Mr. Dooley for your kind words and review. We strive to provide this kind of service for  each home we are called to service.
Blue Springs Heating & Cooling.

name: James Glimpse
text: Kevin came out and serviced/inspected our HVAC System and ensured it was ready for the winter and didn't try and oversell or up-sell unneeded services. Honest Businessman and highly recommended.

name: Scott Griffin
text: Very professional and honest company. He will not upsale you on equipment you don't need and priced very competitive.

resp.text:
Thank you Mr. Griffin for sharing your experience with us.
We appreciate your kind words.
Blue Springs Heating and Cooling.
